mapper.select: select * from chat_channel where id = #{id} and not is_deleted
select * from chat_channel where workspace_id = #{workspaceId} and name = #{name} and not is_deleted
select * from chat_channel where workspace_id = #{workspaceId} and is_public and not is_deleted

select cc.* from chat_channel cc join chat_channel_member ccm on (ccm.channel_id = cc.id and not ccm.is_deleted) where workspace_id = #{workspaceId} and ccm.user_id = #{userId} and not cc.is_public and not cc.is_deleted

select cc.* from chat_channel cc join
chat_channel_member ccm on (cc.id = ccm.channel_id and not ccm.is_deleted) where ccm.user_id = #{memberId} and cc.is_direct_message and not cc.is_deleted
chat_channel_organization cco on (cc.id = cco.channel_id and not cco.is_deleted) where cco.organization_id = #{memberId} and cc.is_direct_message and not cc.is_deleted
